title: Why Forgive Chinese
description:
Twelve years ago, Why Forgive? appeared in bookstores under the title "Seventy Times Seven" Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a reference to JesusÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s advice on how many times we should be ready to forgive in one day.  Today, translated into more than 20 languages, this modest but compelling volume of true stories has been reprinted hundreds of times, and sold or distributed to audiences around the world.

Why Forgive? Read these stories, and decide for yourself.

Nelson Mandela
A much-needed message not only for South Africa, but for the whole world.
